name: Tempo Runs
description: Sustained hard-effort runs at 'comfortably hard' pace (about 80-85% max effort). Builds lactate threshold and mental toughness.

exercises.name: 20-Minute Tempo Run
exercises.description: Classic tempo: 10min easy warmup, 20min tempo pace, 5min cooldown
exercises.instructions: Warm up 10min easy running. Then 20min at tempo pace (conversation is difficult but possible). Cool down 5min easy.

conditions.knee_moderate: Run on soft surface, reduce pace slightly
conditions.hamstring_moderate: Thorough warmup, back off if tightness appears

exercises.paceGuidance: Should feel 'comfortably hard' - you can say a few words but not hold a conversation. About 80-85% max effort.

exercises.name: Cruise Intervals (Tempo Segments)
exercises.description: Broken tempo: 4 x 5min at tempo pace with 1min easy between
exercises.instructions: 10min easy warmup. Then 4 rounds of: 5min tempo, 1min easy jog. Finish with 5min cooldown.

conditions.knee_moderate: Use recovery jog to assess knee, stop if pain develops
conditions.calf_moderate: Stay on flat terrain, avoid hills

exercises.paceGuidance: Same tempo pace as continuous tempo, but broken into segments makes it more manageable mentally.

exercises.name: Progressive Tempo Run
exercises.description: Build pace gradually throughout the tempo portion
exercises.instructions: 10min easy warmup. Then 20min progressive: start at easy tempo (75% effort), gradually increase to hard tempo (85% effort) by end. 5min cooldown.

modifications.harder: 25min progressive, finish at threshold pace (90% effort)

conditions.hamstring_moderate: Focus on gradual progression, don't surge too hard at end

exercises.paceGuidance: Start controlled, every 5min increase pace slightly. Should finish strong but not sprinting.

exercises.name: Tempo Hill Run
exercises.description: Tempo effort on rolling hills - builds power and strength
exercises.instructions: 10min flat easy warmup. Then 20min tempo pace on rolling hills. Maintain effort (not pace) on uphills. 5min flat cooldown.

conditions.calf_moderate: Stay on gradual hills, avoid steep climbs
conditions.knee_moderate: Focus on controlled downhill running, lean forward slightly

exercises.paceGuidance: Pace will slow on uphills - that's fine. Maintain effort level. Don't sprint downhills, stay controlled.

exercises.name: Tempo Fartlek
exercises.description: Unstructured tempo with surges and recoveries based on feel
exercises.instructions: 10min easy warmup. Then 20min: vary between tempo pace and slightly faster surges (30-60s), with brief easy jogs to recover. Stay in tempo zone overall. 5min cooldown.
exercises.paceGuidance: Play with pace - surge to next tree/lamppost, recover briefly, surge again. Overall average should be tempo effort.
